mapper.select:
select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as row_num, ll.loginID, ll.com_name, ll.sales_price from ( select ui.loginID, ui.com_name, sum(pr.selPrice*od.coCnt)as sales_price from tb_userinfo ui inner join tb_cOrder od on ui.loginID = od.loginID inner join tb_product pr on pr.prodNo = od.prodNo where ui.user_type='C' and od.coDpsts = '1'
AND od.coDate between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
group by ui.loginID , ui.com_name order by sum(pr.selPrice*od.coCnt) desc ) ll where (@rownum:=0)=0
limit 0,10
